title: First Class Room
description: Experience luxury at its finest in our First Class Room. This spacious room features a king-sized bed, a private balcony with stunning views, a marble bathroom with a jacuzzi tub, and modern amenities to ensure a comfortable stay. Perfect for travelers seeking a premium experience.

title: Deluxe Room
description: Our Deluxe Room offers a perfect blend of comfort and elegance. Equipped with a queen-sized bed, a cozy seating area, a large flat-screen TV, and a well-appointed bathroom with a rain shower, this room provides all the essentials for a relaxing stay.

title: Suite Room
description: Indulge in the ultimate comfort in our Suite Room. Featuring a separate living area, a plush king-sized bed, a spacious bathroom with premium toiletries, and complimentary high-speed internet, this room is ideal for both business and leisure travelers looking for extra space and luxury.
